creator: bschneid@arsdigita.com
text:
JSP code like this

<%

    // this is a one line comment, where i talk about how <% .. %> is broken

%>

will not work properly because the translator treats the "%>" on the end of the
one-line comment as the closing marker for the JSP scriptlet, when it should be
ignored as a comment.  The JSP spec may be fuzzy on this so it may not really be
a bug.
